kindred.view.cli

Class CLITerrainParser

  • Object
    • kindred.view.cli.CLITerrainParser

  • public final class CLITerrainParser
extends Object
    Provides a method to parse a file that contains the description of Terrains in a command-line user interface.
    Author:
    Kindred Team

    • Method Detail

      • parseFile

        public static HashMap<String,Colour> parseFile(String filename)
                                        throws FileNotFoundException
        Parses a file that describes the display of a Terrain in a terminal interface.

        The file must have lines containing the name of each Terrain and the name of its background colour separated by whitespaces.

        The name of the Terrain must be exactly the same as the one in the file parsed by TerrainFileParser.

        The name of the colour must be exactly one of the ones defined in the Colour enum.

        Parameters:
        filename - name of the file informing colours for each Terrain
        Returns:
        HashMap mapping each Terrain name to a colour object representing its background colour
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - if the specified file is not found
